sentences.sContent: They're easy to grind in a blender or coffee grinder. But get seeds -- there are no lignans in the oil.
sentences.sCn: 他们在搅拌机或咖啡豆的磨具很容易被磨碎，但种子如果榨成油木酚素就被破坏了。

sentences.sContent: Just toss a cup of berries — strawberries, blueberries, raspberries — and a sliced (but not peeled) apple, peach, or pear into your blender.
sentences.sCn: 把一杯莓子——草莓、蓝莓、山莓，还有一片没削皮的苹果、桃、或梨子放入你的搅拌机。

words.tran: [矿物] 闪锌矿；褐色闪光矿物

trans.tranOther: an electric machine that you use to mix liquids and soft foods together
